instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turn on no video
threads.message: i have this macbook air, that turns on but wont give a image; the fan spin, turn off, and star spinning like its supposed to, but after that it just keeps spinning, and the cpu heating up, no image, chime or whatever...where do i start with this?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turn on no video
threads.message:
Check USB activity first.
Any history available?
Did you try BIOS?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turn on no video
threads.message: Mouse blinks once and stay off...no history, board looks spotless no water damage of anything. do you have a good know BIOS for me to try?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turn on no video
threads.message: Search the forum, some link should be already posted...
